cumulated.origin: |- wi(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(cxp(c0, c0), cen, c0))

comment: The Cartesian product of an infinite set with itself is idempotent. This theorem (which is an AC equivalent) provides the basis for infinite cardinal arithmetic. Proposition 10.40 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 95. This proof follows as a corollary of ~ infxpen . (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)
